content: Normaal gezien zou TB berichten als HTML moeten tonen, maar soms worden berichten als platte tekst getoond door opmaakproblemen. Ook kan het zijn dat per abuis de HTML-weergave is uitgeschakeld. In dit artikel (Engelstalig) zijn diverse mogelijke oplossingen te vinden.

content: This is a known bug. it happens because you do not have a default email account defined. click to 'account settings' and click the 'set as default' button for one of the accounts. a star icon will then appear to the right of the account name.
creator: davidsk

Vraj je to znama chyba Thunderbirdu, ze po instalacii-aktualizacii novou verziu pri nastaveni postoveho klienta ako nepredvoleneho nevytvori novu spravu

V nastaveniach a potvrdeni postoveho klienta ako predvoleneho ihned vzapeti po kliknuti vytvori novu spravu
creator: p_struh

content:
re :. I have removed the account from Thunderbird, as well as all the related contacts,

Oauth request access can occur for mail account email and gmail contact address book and also gmail calendars.

You say you have completely removed the gmail mail account. So it's no longer in Thunderbird. You mention removing all related contacts - however contacts are just email addresses which can be move to any address book.....can I assume you have also removed all gmail address books ?

Have you removed all gmail calendars that were related to the account?

Have you removed saved passwords for that gmail account?

  • Settings > Privacy & Security
  • Scroll down to 'Passwords' section
  • Click on 'Saved Passwords'

If you see any lines that mention gmail and the email address of 'removed' gmail account, then select the relevant lines(s) and click on 'Remove'. Click on 'Close'

Exit/Close Thunderbird and wait a few moments for background processes to complete and then start Thunderbird.
creator: Toad-Hall

content: Does the same thing happen with Help > Troubleshooot Mode?

content:
Go to tools>Developer tools>error console - enter this text 

   openDialog("chrome://pippki/content/resetpassword.xhtml")


- the Reset button should appear. All passwords for accounts will be deleted
